segments.text: What do you think of our price ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your price has gone up sharply , hasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we regret we cannot maintain our original price . Since the prices of the raw materials have been raised , we have to adjust the price of our products accordingly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree with you there , but you price is unreasonable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't think so . You must compare our price with that it other export houses . I'm sure our offer is in line with the prevailing market price level .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think we will be able to pay the price . To have this business concluded , you need to lower your price at least by 3 % .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm afraid that there is no room for any reduction in price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you agree with me that in the long run moderate prices we bring about large sales and more profit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We've already cut down our price to cost level .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes this is the best we can do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , we can't handle the price you offered .
segments.speaker: S2
